org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter

类 AbstractConnectionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter.WrapperAdapter
      • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.unsupported.AbstractUnsupportedOperationConnection
        • org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingjdbc.jdbc.adapter.AbstractConnectionAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable, Connection, Wrapper
    直接已知子类:
    MasterSlaveConnection, ShardingConnection

    public abstract class AbstractConnectionAdapter
extends AbstractUnsupportedOperationConnection
    Adapter for Connection.
    作者:
    zhangliang, panjuan, zhaojun, maxiaoguang

        public final Connection getConnection(String dataSourceName)
                               throws SQLException

        参数:

        抛出:
        SQLException - SQL exception

      • getConnections

        public final List<Connection> getConnections(org.apache.shardingsphere.core.constant.ConnectionMode connectionMode,
                                             String dataSourceName,
                                             int connectionSize)
                                      throws SQLException
        Get database connections.
        参数:
        connectionMode - connection mode
        dataSourceName - data source name
        connectionSize - size of connection list to be get
        返回:
        database connections
        抛出:
        SQLException - SQL exception
